channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: St Pauls Lane Resurfacing, 4th May
item.description:
The road outside this garage (What3Words: /// treat.cross.power) on St Pauls lane makes the garage unusable. Please resurface the road here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Saint Pauls Street South, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: H Marking faded and no longer visible, 4th May
item.description:
There was a H marking outside number 4 St Paul's Street South. This is no longer visible and causing issues for the property owner. Would it be possible to get this repainted and enforced?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Saint Pauls Street South, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement no longer usable from overgrown tree, 4th May
item.description:

item.title: Recently resurfaced road has a cast iron inspection cover left approx 75mm below adjacent finished road level., 4th May
item.description:
Manhole cover left approx 75mm below newly laid finished road level making an instant "pothole" Drivers swerving to avoid. location What 3 Words \\\styled.redeemed.escorting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red light still out 3 months after report, 4th May
item.description:
The red light at the junction northbound from Gloucester Business Park onto the Bar wood Bypass is STILL not working. There was a report 3 months ago on this, plus I had previously rang this in as an emergency as it is a red light not working. Have just seen a car almost drive through the junction as a result, and therefore the light needs fixing asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
